title: BRIEF-Teck Reports Labour Action At Carmen De Andacollo
text:
BRIEF-Teck Reports Labour Action At Carmen De Andacollo

Stock Markets 10 minutes ago (Oct 13, 2019 20:10)

© Reuters. BRIEF-Teck Reports Labour Action At Carmen De Andacollo Oct 13 (Reuters) - Teck Resources Ltd : * TECK REPORTS LABOUR ACTION AT CARMEN DE ANDACOLLO * OPERATIONS AT CDA WOULD BE SUSPENDED DURING STRIKE WITH EXCEPTION OF ESSENTIAL ACTIVITIES REQUIRED TO MAINTAIN SAFETY AND ENVIRONMENT * UNION REPRESENTING 473 WORKERS AT TECK CARMEN DE ANDACOLLO OPERATIONS IN CHILE GIVES NOTICE OF PLANS TO START STRIKE ON OCT 14 * PREVIOUS COLLECTIVE BARGAINING AGREEMENT WITH UNION EXPIRED ON SEPTEMBER 30 * CO, UNION ENTERED FIVE-DAY MEDIATION PROCESS CONCLUDING OCT 11 WITHOUT AGREEMENT

BRIEF-Teck Reports Labour Action At Carmen De Andacollo
description: BRIEF-Teck Reports Labour Action At Carmen De Andacollo
